summary.span: 提供当单击 、 或 控件时，显示 的控件的基本功能。

span.span: Provides basic functionality for controls that display a when a , , or control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 、和 的抽象基类，可直接在下拉容器中承载项或承载附加项。 is the abstract base class for , , and , which can host items directly or host additional items in a drop-down container. 为此，可将 属性设置为 并设置 的 属性。You do this by setting the property to a and setting the property of the . 直接通过 属性访问这些下拉项。Access these drop-down items directly through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示和隐藏 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to show and hide controls. Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有 与 相关联，则对 的调用会创建一个泛型下拉控件。If no is associated with the , a call to creates a generic drop-down control. > [!NOTE] > 如果自动生成下拉控件，这意味着将项添加到集合中，然后将 属性设置为显式下拉控件，则可能会丢失数据。If a drop-down control is automatically generated, which means that items are added to the collection, and you then set the property to an explicit drop-down control, you might lose data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件分配给 控件的 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to assign a control to a control's property. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.name: m
param.span: 通过引用传递的 ，表示要处理的窗口消息。

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: 值之一，表示要处理的键。

span.span: One of the values that represents the key to process.

summary.span: 处理命令键。

span.span: Processes a command key.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理过程中调用此方法来处理命令键。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令键的示例包括快捷键和菜单快捷方式。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 方法必须返回 `true`，以指示它已处理命令键，或 `false` 以指示该密钥不是命令键。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 如果 集合中有项，此方法的 实现将调用 的 。The implementation of this method calls the of the if there are items in the collection. 否则，此实现将调用基类实现。Otherwise, this implementation calls the base class implementation.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 方法时，方法重写应返回 ，以指示它已处理该键。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the method override should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 派生类很少需要重写此方法（如果需要）。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

span.span: if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理过程中，将调用此方法来处理向上、向下、向左、向右、ENTER 和空格键以便导航下拉菜单的层次结构。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, ENTER, and SPACEBAR keys in order to navigate the hierarchy of drop-down menus.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 方法时，重写实现应返回 ，以指示它已处理该键。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the overriding implementation should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 派生类很少需要重写此方法（如果需要）。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

summary.span: 显示与此 关联的 控件。

span.span: Displays the control associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法显示已由 属性设置的下拉控件。Use the method to display the drop-down controls that have been set by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在按下按钮时显示 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to show a control when a button is pressed. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
